Translations.Text: Zansong zhangguan zhuquan [zhu] zhe [an la] zhifu! Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Ta chuangzaole si yu sheng, yibian ta kaoyan nimen shei de shangong zui hao [zhu]. Ta shi quanneng de, zui kuanshu de.
Ta chuangzaole qi ge xiangsi de tian. Ni [mu sheng] zai pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de chuangzao zhong kan bu chu renhe quexian. Ni zai kan kan, ni jiujing neng kan chu shenme liehen ne?
Ranhou, ni zai kan liang ci, ni de yanjing jiang hunhua, pijuan di zhuan huilai.
Wo que yi yong qunxing zhuangshi zuijin de tian, bing yi qunxing zuowei quzhu emomen de sheji wuqi. Wo wei tamen [emomen] zhunbeile liehuo de xingfa.
Bu xinyang tamen de zhu [an la] de ren bi shou huo yu de xingfa. Guisu zhen elie!
Dang tamen bei touru huo yu shi, tamen jiang tingjian feiteng de huo yu fachu lu ming ban de housheng.
Huo yu jihu yin fennu er baozha. Mei dang you yiqun ren bei touru qizhong, guanli huo yu zhe [tianshi] bian wen tamen:“Nandao meiyou renhe jinggao zhe jianglin nimen [bing quangao nimen] ma?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Juedui you! You wei jinggao zhe que yi lailin women, dan women fouren ta bing shuo:“An la meiyou jiang shi renhe qishi, nimen zhishi zai ji da de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen hai jiang shuo:“Yaoshi women ceng tingcong huo mingli, women jiu buzhi chengwei huo yu de fanrenle.”
Tamen jiang chengren ziji de zuiguo, suoyi,[nimen] dang yuanli huo yu de fanren.
Fan anzhong weiju tamen de zhu de ren, tamen jiang huode kuanshu he zhongda de baochou [leyuan].
Wulun nimen mimitanhua haishi gongkai tanhua, ta [an la] dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.
Nandao chuangzao zhe [an la] bu zhidao [nimen de mi tan] ma? Ta shi zui minrui de, che zhi de.
Shi ta [an la] wei nimen er shi dadi chengwei youyi de [bianyu nimen yishizhuxing ji nongzuowu shengzhang deng], yin'er nimen ke zai dadishang sichu xingzou, ke chi ta de jiyang. Fuhuo zhi gui ta.
Nandao nimen you bawo tianshang de zhu [an la] bu hui shi da di zai zhendong shi tunmo nimen ma?
Nandao nimen you bawo tianshang de zhu [an la] bu hui jiang fei shazou shi de baofeng xiji nimen ma?[Na shi] nimen jiang zhidao wo de jinggao duo kepa!
Tamen de qian ren que yi fourenguo [wo de jinggao]. Wo de xingfa duo kepa!
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai tamen shangmian zhan suo shuangyi feixiang de niao lei ma? Wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] caineng kongzhi tamen [pingheng feixing]. Ta dui wanshi wanwu que shi quan shi de.
Chu pu ci zhi zhu wai, shei neng yi dajun yuanzhu nimen ne? Bu xinyang zhe zhishi zai zi qi zhi zhong.
Jiaru ta [an la] tingzhi ta [suo tigong] de jiyang, shei neng gongji nimen jiyang ne? Bu, tamen yizhi shi aoman he panni de.
Shi qushen er xingzhe geng neng huode yindao ne? Haishi zai zhengdao [yisilan jiao] shang angshoukuobu zhe geng neng huode yindao?
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Shi ta [an la] chuangzao nimen, bing ci gei nimen er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shi ta shi nimen zai da dishang fanyan,[houshi] nimen dou jiang bei jihe dao ta nali qu.”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao [fuhuo ri] he shi shixian ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wei an la zhidao zhege zhishi [zhu], wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
[Fuhuo ri] dang tamen kanjian ta [xingfa] linjin shi, bu xinyang zhe de lian jiang bian de yin'an [beishang]. You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Zhe jiushi nimen ceng yaoqiu shixian de [xingfa].”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru an la yu huimie wo he wo de zhuisui zhe, huo ci min women, name, shei neng zhengjiu bu xinyang zhe tuoli tongku de xingfa ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Ta shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], women xinyang ta, women xinlai ta. Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao shei shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru nimen de shui shen lou wanliao, shei neng ci gei nimen liutang de quanshui ne?”
Nu nai [alabo yu yige zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Yi bi he tamen [tianshi zai gongguo bu zhong] suo jilu de fa shi!
Yi ni de zhu de enhui fashi! Ni [mu sheng] jue bushi fengzi.
Ni bi jiang huode yongheng de baochou.
Ni dique juyou weida de pinde.
Ni bujiu jiang kanjian, tamen bujiu ye jiang kanjian,
nimen zhong shei shi fengzi.
Ni de zhu dique zui zhidao shei mishile ta [an la] de dao [yisilan jiao], ye zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.
Ni buyao fucong fouren zhe [fouren yisilan jiao, mu sheng he “gulanjing”].
Tamen xiwang ni [zai yisilan jiao shang xiang tamen] tuoxie, yibian tamen ye [xiang ni] tuoxie.
Ni buyao fucong mei ge chang fashi zhe——zhe zhong fashi shi hao wu jiazhi de [zhu],
feibang zhe, sichu zaoyao zhe,
linse zhe [huo fang'ai xingshan zhe], guofen zhe [chaoyue fadu zhe], fanzui zhe,
Canbao zhe, ciwai, hai you sishengzi.
[Zhe shi] yinwei ta yongyou caifu he ernu.
Dang youren xiang ta songdu wo de qishi shi, ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Wo jiang zai ta de bizi shang dashang laoyin.
Wo bi jiang kaoyan tamen, youru wo ceng kaoyan guoyuan de renmen yiyang. Dangshi, tamen [guoyuan de renmen] fashi tamen jiang zai [ci ri] zaochen caizhai yuan zhong de guozi,
dan tamen meiyou shuo:“Yin sha an la [jiaru an la yiyu]!”
Suoyi, dang tamen [yeli] zheng shushui shi, guoyuan zaoshoule cong ni de zhu jiang shi de huozai [bing shaohuile].
Qingchen, guoyuan bian chengle yipian jiaotu.
Zaochen, tamen huxiang hanjiao:
“Jiaru nimen yao caizhai [nimen de guozi], nimen ying zai zaochen dao nimen de guoyuan qu.”
Yushi tamen bian chufale,[tuzhong] tamen di sheng shangyi shuo:
“Jintian buyao rang renhe pinmin jinru yuan zhong darao nimen.”
Tamen zaochen [xinxin baibei de zhunbei] jinru guoyuan,[tamen] yiwei tamen you nengli zuzhi [pinmin jinru guoyuan caizhai guozi].
Dang tamen kanjian guoyuan shi, tamen cai shuo:“Women dique mi wule,
bu, women [de shuiguo] bei boduole.”
Tamen zhong zui youxiu de ren shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou gaosuguo nimen ma? Nimen weisheme bu shuo “yin sha an la [jiaru an la yiyu] ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Zanmei women de zhu chaojue! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Yushi, tamen bici zou lai, huxiang zhize.
Tamen shuo;“women zhen gaisi! Women que shi beini zhe.
Women de zhu yexu hui ci gei women yige bi zhe geng hao de guoyuan. Women dique gui xin women de zhule [women kewang shan bao, kewang ta kuanshu women de zui'e, qie zai houshi ci gei women baochou].”
Zhe jiushi [jinshi de] xingfa, dan houshi de xingfa cai shi zuida de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
Jingwei zhe zai tamen de zhu nali bi jiang huode enze de leyuan.
Nandao wo duidai musilin [guishun zhe] yu duidai fanzui zhe shi yiyang de ma?
Nimen zenme la? Nimen shi zenyang panduan de?
Nandao nimen youyi bu ke gong nimen xuexi de jingdian,
nimen dique ke cong na bu jingdian zhong huode nimen suo xuanze de yiqie ma?
Nandao nimen yu wo dingle dao fuhuo ri cai man qi de shiyue, er nimen bi jiang huode nimen suo panduan de ma?
Ni wen wen tamen ba! Tamen shei neng wei ci danbao ne?
Nandao tamen you “xuduo huoban [zhuzai]” ma? Jiaru tamen shi chengshi zhe, rang tamen ba tamen de “huobanmen [zhuzai]” zhao lai ba!
Dang zainan jianglin, tamen bei zhao qu koubai [an la] di na ri [fuhuo ri], tamen [wei xinzhe] jiang wunengweili [zhu].
Tamen de muguang xiachui, xiuru longzhaozhe tamen.[Zhe shi yinwei] tamen [zai chenshi] jianquan shi, tamen chang bei zhao qu koubai [an la, ru libai, dan tamen bu yuanyi koubai an la].
Ni rang wo chengfa naxie fouren “gulanjing” de ren ba! Wo jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi zhujian chengfa tamen.
Wo jiang zhanshi kuan yan tamen, wo de jihua que shi qiangda de.
Nandao ni [mu sheng] xiang tamen suoquguo [chuanjiao de] baochou, tamen yin nashui er fudan tai zhong ma?
Nandao tamen yongyou wei jian zhi wu [ci chu te zhi tian jing——“shou baohu de xian pai”], yin'er tamen neng jilu xialai ma?
Ni dang naixin dengdai ni de zhu de panjue [zhu], ni buyao xiang na yu de huoban yiyang: Dangshi, ta [yu de huoban] feichang beishang de [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu.
Yaoshi cong ta de zhu jiang shi de enhui meiyou daoda ta, name,[ta biding liu zai yu fu zhong, dan wo kuanshule ta], ta bi shou qianze di bei reng dao guangtutu de an bian.
Ranhou, ta de zhu xuanze ta bing shi ta chengwei shanren zhi yi.
Bu xinyang zhe tingjian jiaohui [“gulanjing”] shi, tamen [zengwu “gulanjing”] de muguang jihu shi ni diedao. Tamen shuo:“Ta [mu sheng] que shige fengzi.”
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi dui zhong shijie de yi xiang jiaohui.
Zhenshi de [ru fuhuo ri]!
Zhenshi de shi shenme?
Ni zen neng zhidao zhenshi de shi shenme?
Sa mu de ren he a de ren ceng fouren da nan [shenpan shi de qiao zhong sheng].
Zhiyu sa mu de ren, yi bei kongbu de jiaohan sheng suo huimie;
zhiyu a de ren, yi bei nuhou de kuangfeng suo huimie.
Ta [an la] ceng shi kuangfeng xiang tamen lianxu guale qiye ba tian, ni kanjian renmen bei gua dao zai dishang [bei huimie], tamen haoxiang kongxin de ye zao shugan yiyang.
Ni kanjian tamen hai you yicun de ma?
Falao he zai ta [falao] zhiqian de renmen, yiji bei dianfu de chengshi de renmin [ru lu te shengren suo ju chengshi de renmin] ceng fanzui.
Tamen weikang tamen de zhu de shizhe, suoyi, ta yanli chengfale tamen.
[Nu ha shengren shidai] dang hongshui fanlan shi, wo rang nimen [nu ha shengren ji qi zhuisui zhe] chengzuo zai [nu ha shengren zhizao de] chuan zhong,
yibian wo shi ta chengwei dui nimen de yi zhong jiaohui, yibian lingmin de er [ren] neng [tingjian bing] lijie.
Dang haojiao [di yici] yi chui xiang,
dadi he qun shan bei yi kai, bici pengzhuang yi ci shi,
zai na ri, na dashi jiang fasheng,
tian jiang polie. Zai na ri, tian shi cuiruo de [jiang lie cheng suipian].
Tianshimen jiang zai tian de ge bian. Zai na ri, zai tamen de shangmian jiang you ba wei tianshi taizhe ni de zhu de baozuo [zhu].
Zai na ri, nimen jiang bei dai chu [shoushen], nimen meiyou renhe mimi ke yinman.
Zhiyu gongguo bu di gei youshou zhe, ta jiang shuo:“Nimen na wo de gongguo bu qu nian ba!
Wo [zai chenshi shi yi] quexin wo bi jiang yujian wo de zhang mu.”
Ta jiang zai yukuai de shenghuo zhong,
zai yige gaoji leyuan zhong,
yuan li de shuiguo shenshou ke zhai.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen yukuai di chihe ba! Yinwei nimen zai guoqu de suiyue li [xinyang bing] xingshan.”
Zhiyu gongguo bu di gei zuoshou zhe, ta jiang shuo:“Yaoshi wo de gongguo bu bu di gei wo duo hao a!
Yaoshi wo bu zhidao wo de zhang mu duo hao a!
Yaoshi [zai chenshi de] siwang neng jieshu wo de yisheng duo hao a!
Wo de caifu dui wo wuyile,
wo de quanli cong wo de zhangwo zhong xiaoshile.”
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen zhua zhu ta, gei ta dai shang jiaoliao;
ranhou, nimen ba ta reng jin liehuo zhong qu;
ranhou, nimen yong yi gen qishi bi zhang de lianzi shuan zhu ta.”
Zhe shi yinwei ta [zai chenshi shi] bu xinyang weida de an la,
bu quanmian renmen jipin [zhu].
Yinci, jintian ta zai zheli meiyou renhe pengyou,
chu [shangkou liuchu de] nong zhi wai, ta meiyou renhe shiwu [ke chi],
zhiyou zui rencai chi na nong zhi.
Wo yi nimen kan de jian de yiqie fashi,
yi nimen kan bujian de yiqie fashi,
zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi wei zungui shizhe [ji bu li lei tianshi huo mu sheng zhuanshu] de yanci,
zhe bushi yi wei shiren de yanci, dan nimen hen shao xinyang.
Zhe ye bushi yi wei zhanbu zhe de yanci, dan nimen hen shao jieshou quangao.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi congzhong shijie zhi zhu jiang shi de.
Jiaru ta [mu sheng] jie wo [an la] de mingyi niezao yixie huangyan,
wo bi yi quanli chengzhi ta,
ranhou, wo bi geduan ta de zhu dongmai,
nimen zhong jue meiyou ren neng zuzhi wo chengfa ta.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaohui.
Wo dique zhidao nimen zhong shei shi fouren [“gulanjing”] zhe.
[Fuhuo ri], zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi bu xinyang zhe beitong [houhui] de quanyuan.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi juedui de zhenli.
Suoyi, ni dang zansong ni weida de zhu de zun ming.
You ge xunwen zhe xunwen jijiang jianglin bu xinyang zhe de xingfa, na shi wu ren neng kangju de,
na xingfa shi jiang zi an la——sheng xiao zhi lu de zhu de.
Tianshimen he jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] zai yi ri zhi nei shangsheng dao ta [an la] nali [zhu], na yi ri de changdu shi [chenshi suo jisuan de] wu wan nian.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] ying haohao rennai.
Tamen yiwei na xingfa shi hen yaoyuan de,
qishi, wo renwei na xingfa shi hen jin de.
Zai na ri, tian xiang tong shui,
shan xiang rongmao,
pengyou xiang jian bu xiang wen.

Jinguan tamen jiang bici xiang jian [fuhuo ri, mei ren dou jiang jian dao ziji de fumu, qizi, ernu he qinqi, dan ta buneng dui tamen jianghua, ye buneng xiang tamen xunqiu yuanzhu], dan fanzui zhe jiang yuanyi shu qu na ri de xingfa, jishi shi fengxian ziji de ernu,
qizi, xiongdi [jiemei],
shourong ta de qinqi,
yiji da dishang suoyou de yiqie, xiwang zhe neng zhengjiu ziji.
Jue bu keneng! Na [dengdai ta de] que shi huoyan de xingfa,
neng bo qu [shao wan] toupi,
neng zhaohui zhuanshen er tao de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Ta [zhuanshen er tao de ren] juji caifu bing yincang [shoucainu, bu yuan wei an la zhi dao shiyong].
Ren que shi bei zaocheng jizao de,
dang ta zaoyu buxing shi, jiu fanzao [buman];
dang ta huode caifu shi, jiu linse [zhu],
Wei chang libai zhe liwai.
Tamen [chang libai zhe] shi chang jin shou bai gong de;
zai tamen de caichan zhong youyi xiang zhouzhi de fen'e,
na shi shishe gei qiqiu zhe he qiong er bu qiqiu zhe de [zhu];
tamen shi chengxin shenpan ri de;
tamen shi weiju tamen de zhu de xingfa de;
tamen de zhu de xingfa shi jue meiyou ren neng quebao qi anquan de;
tamen shi baochi zhencao de,
chufei shi dui tamen de qizi huo tamen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu, yinwei [zai zhe zhong qingkuang xia] tamen shi bu shou zebei de;
fan zai ci zhi wai zai you yaoqiu zhe, zhexie ren que shi guofen [chaoyue fadu] zhe;
tamen shi zunshou xintuo he mengyue de;
tamen shi binggong zuozheng de;
tamen shi jin shou bai gong de.
Zhexie ren zai leyuan li shi shou zunjing de.
Bu xinyang zhe zenme cheng qun jie dui jizhuo ting ni [mu sheng] suo yan er zai ni de zuoyou ne?[Tamen jizhuo ting ni suo yan, yibian fouren ni, chaoxiao ni he “gulanjing”].
Nandao tamen mei ren dou kewang jinru enze de leyuan ma?
Jue bu keneng! Wo que yi yong tamen suo zhidao de chuangzao tamen.
Wo yi suoyou dongfang he xifang [ji suoyou fangxiang] de zhu fashi, wo dique you nengli yi bi tamen geng hao de daiti tamen, wu ren neng chaoguo wo.
Yinci, ni rang tamen wang tan wanle ba! Zhidao tamen zaoyu tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
Zai na ri, tamen jiang cong fenmu zhong congmang ben chu, haoxiang ben xiang [saipao de] zhongdian yiyang,
tamen de muguang xiachui, xiuru longzhaozhe tamen. Zhe jiushi tamen suo bei jinggao de rizi.
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao zai dadishang liu xia yige bu xinyang zhe.
Jiaru ni liu xia tamen, tamen bi shi ni de pu renmen mi wu, tamen zhi shengyu beini zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe [zhu].
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni kuanshu wo, wo de fumu, xinyang er jinru wojia zhong de ren, yiji nannu xinshimen; qiu ni zengjia dui bu yi zhe de huimie.”
Wo que yi paiqian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zuren.[Wo dui ta shuo]:“Zai tongku de xingfa jianglin ni de zuren qian, ni dang jinggao tamen.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.
Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang jingwei ta, dang fucong wo,
ta [an la] hui kuanshu nimen de zui'e, bing yanhuan nimen dao yige dingqi. Dang an la de dingqi lailin shi, jue buneng bei huanxing, jiaru nimen zhidao.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi zhouye zhaohuan wo de zuren [xinfeng yisilan jiao],
dan wo de zhaohuan que shi tamen gengjia taobi [zhenli].
Wo mei ci zhaohuan tamen, yibian ni kuanshu tamen shi, tamen zong ba shouzhi sai jin erduo, yong yifu zhe zhu ziji. Tamen wangu qie jiao'ao zi da.
Ranhou, wo gao sheng zhaohuan tamen,
ranhou, wo gongkai quandao tamen, ye sixia quandao tamen.”
Wo [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang qiu nimen de zhu [an la] kuanshu, ta que shi zui kuanshu de [zhu].
Ta [an la] jiang jiang gei nimen fengfu de yushui,
bing shi nimen de caifu he ernu zengduo, qie ci gei nimen yixie guoyuan he heliu.”
Nimen zenme [bu weiju an la de xingfa ye] bu kewang an la de baochou ne?
Ta que yi zai ji ge jieduan [zhu][shouxian shi jingye, ranhou shi ningxie, ranhou shi rou tuan……(jian 23:13-14)] Chuangzao nimen.
Nandao nimen meiyou kanjian an la zenyang chuangzao qi ge xiangsi de tian,
bing zai qizhong zao yueliang wei guangming, zao taiyang wei mingdeng ma?
An la shi nimen sheng yu dadi [ru renlei bei zao yu tu],
ranhou [si hou] you shi nimen fugui yu dadi, zuihou [fuhuo ri] you ba nimen quchu [fuhuo].
An la wei nimen er shi da di liaokuo,
yibian nimen zai da dishang zou kuankuo de daolu.
Nu ha shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Tamen que yi weikang wo, tamen zhuisui naxie qi caichan he ernu zhi gei tamen zengjia sunshi [huimie] de ren.
Tamen zhidingle yige da yinmou.
Tamen shuo:“Nimen jue buyao fangqi nimen de shenlingmen [ouxiang], nimen jue buyao fangqi wa de, su wa'er, ye wu si, ye ou ge he na si er [zhexie shi tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang ming].”
Tamen que yi [yong ouxiang] shi xuduo ren mi wu.“[An la a!] Qiu ni shi bu yi zhe gengjia mi wu.”
Tamen yin tamen de zui'e er bei yan si, ranhou jinru huo yu. Chu an la wai, tamen juedui zhao bu dao renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo yi feng dao qishi: You yiqun jingling [san zhi shi ge] qingtingle [“gulanjing”]. Tamen shuo:“Women que yi tingjian qimiao de “gulanjing”,
ta dao ren yu zhengdao, suoyi, women yi xinyang ta, women [zai chongbai women de zhu shi] jue bu gei women de zhu [an la] shezhi renhe huoban.
Zansong women de zhu zhigao zhi gui, ta meiyou qizi, ye meiyou ernu.
Women zhong de yumei zhe [ru yi bu lisi huo jingling zhong de duoshenjiao tu] chang zaoyao wumie an la.
Women yuan yiwei renlei he jingling [zhu] jue bu hui zaoyao wumie an la.
Renlei zhong youxie nanren dique qiu nan jingling baohu [tamen], yin'er tamen [jingling] shi tamen [renlei] gengjia fanzui [he buxin].
Tamen dique xiang nimen yiyang wang cai an la jue bu hui [ji renlei huo jingling] paiqian renhe shizhele.
Women ceng shitu deng tian, dan women faxian tianshang bu manle weiyan de weishi he huoyan.
Women yiqian ceng zuo zai tianshang yixie ke zuo di difang qieting. Buguo, xianzai shei qieting, shei bian hui faxian you ge maifuzhe de huoyan zai jianshi ta.
Women zhen de bu zhidao shi da dishang de ren yao zaoyu buxing ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yindao tamen zunxing zhengdao?
Women zhong dique youxie shanren, ye youxie eren, women fen wei xuduo zongpai.
Women zhen de renwei women zai da dishang jue buneng taotuo an la de xingfa, jue buneng taobi an la de chengfa.
Dang women tingjian zhengdao [“gulanjing”] shi, women jiu xinyangle. Shei xinyang ta de zhu, shei jiu bupa kekou [shan bao], ye bupa zengjia [e bao].
Women zhong dique youxie musilin, ye youxie bu xinyang zhe [beili zhengdao zhe]. Shei chengwei musilin, zhexie ren yi xunqiu dao zhengdao [yisilan jiao].
Zhiyu bu xinyang zhe, tamen jiang shi huo yu de ranliao.”
Jiaru tamen [fei musilin] zunxing zhengdao [yisilan jiao], wo bi ci gei tamen fengfu de yushui,
yibian wo yi ci kaoyan tamen. Shei bi kai zan nian ta de zhu [ru fouren “gulanjing”, bu zunxing yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui deng], ta [an la] jiang shi shei jinru [huo yu de] yanxing zhong.
Yiqie qingzhensi [libai di difang] dou shi an la de [zhu], suoyi, nimen buyao ji bai an la, you bai qita zhuzai.
Dang an la de puren [mu sheng zai libai zhong] zhanzhe qiqiu ta [an la] shi, tamen [jingling] juji zai ta [mu sheng] zhouwei, yige aizhe yige qingting [mu sheng songdu “gulanjing”].
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhi qiqiu wo de zhu [an la], wo jue bu gei ta shezhi renhe huoban.”
Ni shuo:“Wo jue buneng wei nimen zhuchi huo fu.”
Ni shuo:“[Jiaru wo bu fucong an la], jue meiyou ren neng baohu wo mian shou an la de xingfa. Chu ta wai, wo jue buneng zhaodao renhe binan chu.
[Wo de zeren] zhishi chuanda an la de qishi he shiming [yisilan jiao]. Shei weikang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], shei bi shou huo yu de xingfa, yong ju qizhong.
Deng tamen kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa shi, tamen cai zhidao shei zai yuanzhu fangmian zui ruo, shei zai shumu fangmian zuishao.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao de xingfa shi linjin de? Haishi wo de zhu [an la] yao wei ta guiding yige changyuan de qixian?”
[Ta] shi quanzhi yiqie wei jian zhi wu de zhu, ta bu hui xiang renhe ren xielou ta de wei jian zhi wu [de zhishi],
chufei shi tasuo tiaoxuan de [chuzi renlei de] shizhe,[an la yu gaosu ta duoshao wei jian zhi wu, jiu gaosu ta duoshao], bing pai yiqun jingwei zhe [tianshi] suihang yu ta [shizhe] de qianhou.
Yibian ta [an la] zhidao tamen [shizhe] que yi chuandale tamen de zhu [an la] de shiming. Ta [an la] zhouzhi tamen [shizhe] de yi yan yixing. Ta tongji wanwu de shumu [an la que zhi wanwu de shumu].
Guo [zai] yi [fu zhong] de ren [mu sheng] a!
Ni dang zai yeli qishen libai, chu shao bufen shijian wai,
ji ban ge ye huo shao yidian,
huo duo yidian. Ni dang yiyangduncuo songdu “gulanjing”.
Wo bi jiang jiang shi ni zhongda de yanci [ru shenme shi hefa zhi wu, shenme shi feifa zhi wu deng].
Yeli qishen [libai] que shi jiannan de, dan ta shi zui youxiao de, shi zui neng kezhi ziji de, shi zui yi lijie an la zhi yan de [zhu].
Ni zai baizhou dique mangyu chuli richang shiwu.
Ni dang zan nian ni de zhu de zun ming [zhu], dang quanxinquanyi xianshen yu ta [an la].
[Ta] shi dongfang he xifang de zhu, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, ni dang yi ta wei jianhu zhe.
Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai, dang limao de likai tamen.
Ni rang wo chengzhi xiangfu er fouren [wo de] qishi de ren ba! Ni zhanshi kuandai tamen yixia ba!
Wo zheli que you [shuan tamen de] jiaoliao he liehuo,
you ye ren de shiwu he tongku de xingfa.
Dang dadi he qun shan qianglie zhendong di na ri, qun shan jiang bian cheng yi dui qingxie er xia de san sha.
Wo que yi paiqian yi wei shizhe [mu sheng] lai jiaohua nimen [renlei], wei nimen zuozheng, youru wo ceng paiqian yi wei shizhe [mu sa] qu jiaohua falao yiyang.
Dan falao weikangle na wei shizhe [mu sa], suoyi, wo yi yanxing chengzhile ta [falao].
Jiaru nimen bu xinyang, name, nimen zenyang fangbei jiang shi ertong bian cheng bai fa laoren di na ri [fuhuo ri] ne?
[Zai na ri], tian jiang yinci er benglie, ta [an la] de nuoyan shi yao shixian de.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui. Youzhi zhe ke zi ze yitiao tong xiang ta de zhu de dadao.

Ni de zhu dique zhidao ni [yeli] libai jihu zhan qule ye de san fen zhi er,[youshi shi] er fen zhi yi,[youshi shi] san fen zhi yi, gensui ni de ren zhong you yibufen ren ye ruci. An la yuding zhouye de changdu. Ta [an la] zhidao nimen buneng zheng ye libai, suoyi ta kuanshule nimen. Nimen dang songdu “gulanjing” zhong [nimen] rongyi lijie de jing wen. Ta zhidao nimen zhong youxie ren jiang huan bing, youxie ren jiang wei xunqiu an la de enhui er zai da dishang benbo, youxie ren jiang wei an la zhidao zhandou, suoyi nimen dang songdu “gulanjing” zhong [nimen] rongyi lijie de jing wen. Nimen dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, wei an la [zhidao] juanxian yi bi shan kuan. Fanshi nimen wei ziji suo zuo de shangong, nimen jiang zai an la nali jian dao ta [de baochou], zhe shi zui hao de, zuida de baochou. Nimen dang qiu an la kuanshu. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Gai changpao de ren [mu sheng] a!
Ni qilai jinggao [renlei] ba!
Ni zansong ni de zhu zhi da ba![Ji nian “an la hu ai ke bai er (an la zhi da)”.]
Ni jiejing ni de yifu ba!
Ni likai wuhui [ouxiang chongbai] ba!
Ni buyao shi en er tu [chenshi de] hou bao.
Ni dang wei ni de zhu jianren.
Dang haojiao [di er ci] chui xiang shi,
neitian jiang shi yige kunan de rizi,
bu xinyang zhe shi hen nanduguo na ri de.
Ni rang wo [an la] duzi chufa wo suo chuangzao di nage ren [wa li de•ben•mu qi la] ba!
Wo ceng ci gei ta daliang de caifu,
he ta shenbian de ernu;
wo shi taguo shangle shushi anyi de shenghuo,
dan ta hai shewang wo ci gei ta geng duo de.
Jue bu keneng! Ta dique wangu de fandui wo de qishi.
Wo jiang shi ta [zai huo yu li] shou yanxing.
Ta que yi sikao he mouhuaguo.
Buguan ta ruhe mouhua, ta dou shi zi qu huimie de.
Buguan ta ruhe mouhua, ta zhonggui shi zi qu huimie de.
Ranhou ta you sikao.
Ranhou, ta zhoumei baozao.
Ranhou, ta aoman di zhuan guo shen qu.
Ta shuo:“Zhe zhishi qian ren chuanxi de moshu,
zhe zhishi fanren de yanci.”
Wo jiang ba ta reng ru huo yu.
Ni zen neng zhi dao huo yu [jiujing] shi shenme?
Huo yu ji bu hui kuanrong renhe zuifan, ye bu hui rang renhe wu liu xia [wei shao jin].
Ta shao jiao jifu.
Guanli huo yu zhe, gong 19 wei tianshi.

Wo zhi pai tianshi zuo huo yu de guanli zhe, wo zhi yi tamen [tianshi] de shumu [19 wei] kaoyan bu xinyang zhe, yibian shi shou ci jingdian zhe [you jing ren] quexin [“gulanjing” shi zhenli, yu tamen suo yongyou de jingdian yizhi. Guanli huo yu de tianshi zai “tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong yeshi 19 wei], er xinshimen gengjia duxin [“gulanjing” shi zhenli], bing shi shou ci jingdian zhe he xinshimen dou bu huaiyi, yimian xinzhong you bing zhe [wei xinzhe] he bu xinyang zhe shuo:“An la she zhege biyu de zhiyi shi shenme ne?” An la ruci shi tasuo yiyu zhe mi wu, yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zunxing zhengdao. Chu ni de zhu [an la] wai, meiyou ren neng zhi dao ta [an la] de jundui [tianshi]. Zhe [huo yu] zhishi dui renlei de yige jinggao.
Yi yueliang fashi,
yi xiaoshi shi de ye fashi,
yi faguang shi di liming fashi,
ta [huo yu huo fouren mu sheng huo fuhuo ri] que shi zuida de zainan zhi yi,
shi dui renlei de yige jinggao,
jinggao nimen zhong xiang qianjin zhe [xingshan zhe] huo houtui zhe [zuo'e zhe].
Mei ren dou yi ziji suo zuo de zuo diya,
wei youshou bian de renmen [xinshi] liwai.
Tamen [youshou bian de ren] jiang zai leyuan li huxiang xunwen,
xunwen fanzui zhe de qingkuang:
“Shi shenme shi nimen jinru huo yu de?”
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women meiyou libai [zhu];
women meiyou jipin;
women yu wang tan zhe yiqi wang tan [an la suo zengwu de];
women fouren shenpan ri,
zhidao siwang jianglin women.”
Renhe qiuqing zhe de qiuqing dui tamen dou shi wuyi de.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] weihe hai yao huibi zhe xiang jiaohui ne?
Tamen youru yiqun shoujing de ye lu,
gang taotuo shizi [zhuibu huo lieren de zhuibu].
Qishi, tamen mei ren dou xiwang [cong an la nali] shou ci yixie zhankai de jing wen [ru jing wen shang you “yisilan jiao shi zhenli zhi jiao, mu sheng yi yi zhenli cong an la jianglin tamen……].
Jue bu keneng! Tamen bu weiju houshi [an la de xingfa].
Xuzhi, zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui.
Shei yuanyi,[shei jiu songdu], shei jiu jieshou quangao.

Chufei an la yiyu, fouze, tamen jue bu hui jieshou quangao. Ta [an la] shi ying shou [renlei] jingwei de zhu, shi zui kuanshu de zhu [fan zai chenshi wei chufan an la de jinling, zhi xingshan er wei zuo'e zhe, an la jiang kuanshu ta, bu chengfa ta].
Wo yi fuhuo ri fashi;
wo yi zi ze de ren [xinshi] fashi,
nandao ren [bu xinyang zhe] renwei wo jue buneng jihe ta de haigu ma?
Juedui neng! Erqie wo hai neng shi ta de mei ge shouzhi [de haigu] fuyuan.
Bu,[ren zong shi fouren fuhuo yu qingsuan, suoyi] ren yuan jixu fanzui.
Ta wen:“Fuhuo ri zai shenme shihou?”
Dang ren yanhualiaoluan shi,
dang yueliang andan shi,
dangri yue xiang hui shi [ru fa sheng ri shi huo yue shi shi],
zai na ri, ren jiang shuo:“[Wo] wang nali tao ne?”
Bu! Wu chu ke tao.
Zai na ri, zhiyou dao ni de zhu nali cai you anju zhi suo.
Zai na ri, ren jiang bei gaozhi ta shengqian suo zuo de shan e he yi xia de shan e [dui hou ren de yingxiang].
Qishi, ren dui zishen jiushi yi zhong jianzheng [ren de shouzu pifu deng jiang zuozheng ren suo zuoguo de shan e],
jishi ta tichu ge zhong tuoci [yangai ziji de zui'e].
Ni [mu sheng] buyao yaodong ni de shetou, yibian ni congmang songdu ta [“gulanjing”].
Huiji ta [“gulanjing”] he jiao ni songdu ta que shi wo de zeren.
Dang wo [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] ba ta [“gulanjing”] songdu gei ni shi, ni dang genzhe songdu.
Ranhou,[xiang ni] jieshi ta yeshi wo de zeren.
Bu! Nimen [renlei] tanlian jinshi shenghuo,
dan nimen huluele houshi.
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu [ji xinshi di mianmu] jiang shi guanghui canlan de,
yangwangzhe tamen de zhu [an la].
Zai na ri, youxie mianmu [ji bu xinyang zhe de mianmu] jiang shi yin'an de,
tamen quexin ziji bi zao da nan.
Bu, dang [jiang sizhe de] linghun daoda suogu [yanhou] shi,
you hua sheng shuo:“Shei neng jiu ta tuoli siwang ne?”
Ta [jiang sizhe] quexin siwang de shike daole.
[Siwang de] tongku jiezhong er lai.
Zai na ri, ta jiang bei qugan dao ni de zhu nali.
Yinwei ta [bu xinyang zhe zai chenshi] bu quexin [“gulanjing”], bu libai,
er ta que fouren [“gulanjing” he mu sheng], beili zhenli.
Ranhou, ta aoman de hui dao ta de jiaren nali.
Ni [bu xinyang zhe] yao zao buxingle! Ni yao zao buxingle!
Ni yao zao buxingle! Ni yao zao buxingle!
Nandao ren yiwei ta keyi fangzong [weisuoyuwei er bu shou chengfa] ma?
Nandao ta yuan bushi yidi bei shechu de jingye ma?
Ranhou, na di jingye bian cheng yikuai ningxie, ranhou, ta [an la] chuangzao ta bing shi ta yunchen.
Ta yong na di jingye chuangzaole nannu liangxing.
Nandao neng zheyang zuo de ta [an la] hai buneng shi sizhe fuhuo ma?[Juedui neng].
Nandao ren wei jingli yiduan zhide ji zhu de shiqi ma?
Wo dique yong yidi hunhe de jingye chuangzaole ren, mudi shi kaoyan ta, suoyi wo shi ta neng ting neng kan.
Wo que yi yindao ta zunxing zhengdao, ta yexu shi gan'en zhe, yexu shi wang'enfuyi zhe.
Wo dique wei bu xinyang zhe zhunbeile tie lian [jiaoliao], tie quan [shoukao] he [huo yu de] liehuo.
Qiancheng zhe [jingwei an la, yuan bi zui'e zhe] bi jiang yinyong [leyuan li]“ke fu er” quanshui tiaozhi de xian jiu,
na shi an la de pu renmen suo yinyong de yi gu quanshui, tamen jiang shi na gu quanshui daliang yong chu.
Tamen luxing shiyue, bing weiju zainan pu jiang zhi ri.
Tamen wei jing'ai ta [an la] er zhenji pinmin [zhu 1], gu'er [zhu 2] he fulu.
[Tamen shuo]:“Women zhi wei huoqu an la de xiyue er zhenji nimen, women buyao nimen de huibao he gan'en.
Women dique weiju cong women de zhujiang shi de kongbu kunan zhi ri [de xingfa].”
Suoyi, an la jiang zhengjiu tamen tuoli na ri de zainan, bing shi tamen rongguang huanfa, xingfu yukuai.
Youyu tamen jianren, ta jiang ci gei tamen leyuan he sichou [zuo de yifu].
[Tamen zai leyuan li jiang] kao zai bao yi shang, ji bu jue yanre, ye bu jue hanleng.
Leyuan de yin ying zhezhe tamen, leyuan de shuiguo shenshou ke zhai.
Yin zhi qimin he shuijing bei jiang chuandi gei tamen,
na shuijing bei qishi yeshi yin zhi de, tamen ke suiyi jueding bei zhong de rongliang [xiang zhuang duoshao, jiu zhuang duoshao].
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang bei ci yinyong jiang tiaozhi de xian jiu,
na shi leyuan li yi gu ming jiao “se lei se bi lei” de quanshui.
Yongyuan nianqing de tongpu jiang fushi tamen. Dang ni kanjian tamen shi, ni hui yiwei tamen shi san kai de zhenzhu.
Dang ni guankan nali [leyuan] shi, ni jiang kanjian [xiangxiang bu dao de] enze he daguo.
Tamen chuan de yifu shi shang deng lu chou jia jin si zuo de, tamen dai de shi yin shouzhuo. Tamen de zhu jiang ci gei tamen xian jiu.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Zhe jiushi gei nimen de baochou, nimen de shangong yi bei jieshou.”
Wo que yi ba “gulanjing” xunxujianjin jiang gei ni [mu sheng],
yinci, ni dang naixin tingcong ni de zhu de panjue, ni buyao fucong tamen zhong de fanzui zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe.
Ni dang zai zaochen [chen li] he xiawu [shang li he bu li] zan nian ni de zhu de zun ming ③.
Yeli, ni dang yong shao bufen shijian koubai ta [zhu][hun li he xiao li], bingyong da bufen shijian zansong ta [ru li “te ha zhu de bai”(shenye libai)].
Zhexie ren [bu xinyang zhe] dique tanlian [duanzan de] jinshi shenghuo, tamen huluele chenzhong zhi ri de xingfa.
Wo chuangzao tamen, bing ci gei tamen qiangjian de tipo. Jiaru wo yiyu, wo jiang yong xiang tamen yiyang de ren lai chedi daiti tamen.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] que shi yi xiang jiaohui, youzhi zhe ke zi ze yitiao tong xiang ta de zhu de dadao.
Chufei an la yiyu, fouze, nimen jue buneng zheyang zuo. An la que shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
Ta jiang shi tasuo yiyu zhe jinru ta de enhui zhong. Zhiyu bu yi zhe, ta wei tamen zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.
Yi jielian bei paiqian zhe [tianshi huo shizhe] fashi,
yi menglie chui dong de kuangfeng fashi,
yi qu yun xia yu de feng fashi,
yi fenbian zhen wei de [“gulanjing”] jing wen fashi,
yi xiang shizhemen chuanda qishi de tianshimen fashi,
yibian zhongzhi yuanliang huo jinggao.
Nimen suo bei jinggao de kending shi yao fasheng de.
Dang xingchen andan shi;
dangtian ti polie shi;
dang qun shan [ru huichen] feiyang shi;
dang shizhemen dingqi bei zhaoji shi;
zhexie jixiang na ri shixian ne?
Zai panjue ri [shixian].
Ni zen neng zhidao panjue ri [fuhuo ri] shi shenme?
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Nandao wo meiyou huimie qian ren ma?
Ranhou, wo jiang shi hou ren bu tamen de houchen.
Wo ruci chengzhi fanzui zhe.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Nandao wo meiyou yong wuyong de jingye chuangzao nimen ma?
Wo ba ta fangzhi zai yige anquan chu [zigong],
dao yige dingqi.
Wo ruci yuding. Wo shi duome zhuoyue de yuding zhe a!
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Nandao wo meiyou shi dadi chengwei baorong yiqie huo wu he si wu de?
Wo zai da dishang anzhile jiangu de gaoshan bing ci gei nimen yinyong de tianshui.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
[You hua sheng dui bu xinyang zhe shuo]:“Nimen qu jian nimen suo fouren de yiqie ba!
Nimen qu jian yousan ge zhu de yin ying ba!”[Huo yu de yan zai shangsheng guocheng zhong jiang bian wei san zhu].
Na yin ying ji bu chansheng yinliang, ye buneng zhedang [huo yu de] lieyan.
Huo yu penshe chu gaolou ban de huohua,
na huohua haoxiang huangse de luotuo [huo kunbang de shengsuo].
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Zhe shi tamen buneng shuohua zhi ri.
Tamen jiang de bu dao renhe xuke, yi zuo bianjie.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Zhe shi panjue ri, wo jiang ba nimen he qian ren dou jihe qilai.
Jiaru nimen you jimou, nimen jiu yong jimou duifu wo ba!
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Jingwei zhe bi jiang zhu zai yin ying xia, quanshui pang,
[tamen jiang huode] tamen suo xiang chi de shuiguo.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen yukuai di chihe ba! Zhe shi yinwei nimen [zai chenshi] chang xingshan.”
Wo bi jiang ruci baochou xingshan zhe.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
[You hua sheng dui bu xinyang zhe shuo]:“[Bu xinyang zhe a!] Nimen zhanshi [zai chenshi] chihe wanle ba! Nimen que shi fanzui zhe.”
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen dang [libai] jugong [zhu]” shi, tamen bu jugong.
Zai na ri, fouren [fuhuo ri] zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Chu zhe bu “gulanjing” wai, tamen yao xinyang shenme yanci ne?
